1. Nvidia Reportedly Halts H20 Production After Beijing Directive To Stop Buying AI Chip  Investor's Business Daily
  2. Nvidia orders halt to H20 chip production after China directive, The Information says  Yahoo Finance
  3. China turns against Nvidia’s AI chip after ‘insulting’ Howard Lutnick remarks  Financial Times
  4. Nvidia Orders Halt to H20 Production After China Directive Against Purchases  The Information
  5. Exclusive: Nvidia working on new AI chip for China that outperforms the H20, sources say  Reuters
